Hi,
I asked this question several times in several sites in several forms but no answer: Is it possible to use EventToCommand with Prism+MEF because i want to handle xaml event in the view model without code behind and i need to send Event Args to the vew model .
Thanks

Hi,

Did you try it? I don't see any reason why it shouldn't work. Note however that Blend triggers cannot react to all event types, only routed events.

Thanks
Laurent

Like Laurent said, there is no reason for EventToCommand not to work in your PRISM/MEF application. If it helps, we are currently using it in our PRISM 4 solution (we are also using MEF for DI) so I can confirm it works.

Hi,
This is great news. Please check this discussion at How to Trigger and handle TextChanged event from Text Box within DataGridColumnHeader in style Resource Dictionary where i wrote down the problem in details and help me rectify the errors.
